com.paydiant.android.ui.service.loyalty

Interface ILoyaltyManagementListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter

    public interface ILoyaltyManagementListener
    The listener interface for receiving ILoyaltyManagementService operation callbacks. In order to register for callback events, an instance of this would needed to be set through the ILoyaltyManagementService.setLoyaltyManagementListener(ILoyaltyManagementListener) method. This must be set before invoking any of the service operations.

    In order to provide support for subset of the events, use the LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter. Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Since:
    3.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
    See Also:
    LoyaltyManagementListenerAdapter

      • onLoyaltyManagementError

        void onLoyaltyManagementError(PaydiantException exception)
        Gets called on loyalty management error. Refer to the ILoyaltyManagerService class for the error status codes returned for each loyalty operations.
        Parameters:
        exception - PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the erroneous status codes and the loyalty event that the error occurred.
